content.query:
IF EXISTS ( SELECT * FROM sys.external_tables WHERE object_id = OBJECT_ID('dbo.reconloads') )
    DROP EXTERNAL TABLE dbo.reconloads
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE dbo.reconloads (
[v1ID] int,
[v1FromID] int,
[v1ToID] int,
[v1RouteID] int,
[v1DriverID] int,
[v1SealNo] nvarchar(4000),
[v1VehicleID] int,
[v1TTypeID] int,
[v1UserID] int,
[v1LDate] datetime2(7),
[v1CourierID] nvarchar(4000),
[v1ServiceID] nvarchar(4000),
[v1Site] nvarchar(4000),
[v1Spanner] int,
[v1SpareWheel] int,
[v1Tyres] int,
[v1FromLocID] int,
[v1ToLocID] int,
[v1CDate] datetime2(7),
[v1UserID2] int,
[v1Trailer1] int,
[v1Trailer2] int,
[v1CRef] nvarchar(4000),
[v1Debriefed] int,
[v1mrpFlag] int,
[v1OldLoadID] int,
[v1VehicleRegNo] nvarchar(4000),
[v1DriverName] nvarchar(4000),
[v1mrpCFlag] int,
[v1finalFlag] int,
[v1AlidaFlag] int,
[v1vehodo] float,
[v1vehodo2] float,
[v1PUIBTs] int,
[v1PUCOLs] int,
[v1DBUserID] int,
[v1Crew] nvarchar(4000),
[v1PlanningRef] nvarchar(4000),
[v1InterfaceDate] datetime2(7),
[v1NoSealsRet] int,
[v1ExcludeOpsi] int,
[v1DCCRef] nvarchar(4000),
[v1SRouteID] int,
[v1FuelLitres] numeric(36,6),
[v1outsourcedCrew] int,
[v1MasterLoadID] int,
[v1SecurityGateDespatched] datetime2(7),
[v1SecurityGateUserID] int,
[v1SecurityGateArrived] datetime2(7),
[v1SecurityGateArrivedUserID] int,
[v1LastUpdate] datetime2(7),
[v1BayNo] nvarchar(4000),
[v1Costs] numeric(36,6),
[v1ESTDepartureDateTime] datetime2(7),
[v1TotalWeight] numeric(36,6),
[v1SupUserID] int,
[v1ovrIgnore] int,
[v1orvcleandispatch] int,
[v1orvskippeddeliveries] int,
[v1orvendorsments] int,
[v1orvreturns] int,
[v1orvduration] int,
[v1orvincident] int,
[v1ChildLoadID] int,
[v1ORVCode] int,
[v1CompanyID] int,
[v1EditLoadDate] datetime2(7),
[v1ReOpenedDate] datetime2(7),
[v1ReOpenedUserID] int,
[v1ORVID] int,
[v1NoVehicle] int,
[v1MobileFeedbackReasonID] int,
[v1Direct] int,
[v1ORV_Status] nvarchar(4000),
[v1ORVStatus] nvarchar(4000),
[v1NoOfPcls] int,
[v1DebriefDt] datetime2(7),
[v1HTTPCode] int,
[v1PODUserID] int,
[v1ParentLoadID] int,
[v1ORVDevice] nvarchar(4000),
[v1Remarks] nvarchar(4000),
[v1EffectiveLoadDurationMinutes] int,
[v1EffectiveOffLoadDurationMinutes] int,
[v1MRPOBVersion] int,
[v1actualdistance] int,
[v1PclsLoaded] int,
[v1DepotEnter] datetime2(7),
[v1DepotExit] datetime2(7),
[v1supUserID2] int,
[v2id] bigint,
[v2fromlocid] bigint,
[v2tolocid] bigint,
[v2driveruid] nvarchar(4000),
[v2vehicleuid] nvarchar(4000),
[v2traileruid] nvarchar(4000),
[v2sectraileruid] nvarchar(4000),
[v2tmsid] bigint,
[v2parentid] bigint,
[v2thirdpartyid] bigint,
[v2lastclosedate] bigint,
[v2estdepartdate] bigint,
[v2debriefdate] bigint,
[v2vehiclefleetcode] nvarchar(4000),
[v2drivername] nvarchar(4000),
[v2trailerfleetcode] nvarchar(4000),
[v2sectrailerfleetcode] nvarchar(4000),
[v2type] nvarchar(4000),
[v2status] nvarchar(4000),
[v2bayid] bigint,
[v2batchdelivery] int,
[v2cref] nvarchar(4000),
[v2totweight] float,
[v2numpcls] int,
[v2excluderouting] int,
[v2loadstartdate] bigint,
[v2loadstopdate] bigint,
[v2offloadstartdate] bigint,
[v2offloadstopdate] bigint,
[v2startodo] int,
[v2stopodo] int,
[v2supervisorid] bigint,
[v2supervisorname] nvarchar(4000),
[v2orvid] bigint,
[v2orvstatus] nvarchar(4000),
[v2orvignore] int,
[v2novehicle] int,
[v2insdate] bigint,
[v2moddate] bigint,
[v2insby] int,
[v2legacyid] bigint,
[v2migrationstatus] nvarchar(4000),
[v2fromlocname] nvarchar(4000),
[v2tolocname] nvarchar(4000),
[v2thirdparty] nvarchar(4000),
[v2bayname] nvarchar(4000),
[v2totchargeweight] float,
[v2debriefstatus] nvarchar(4000),
[v2movementid] bigint,
[notinv2] int,
[v2legacyfromlocid]  bigint,
[v2legacytolocid] bigint,


	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'Structured Data/LMSV2/reconloads.parquet',
	DATA_SOURCE = [synapse_citylogisticsstorage_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseParquetFormat]
	)
GO


SELECT TOP 100 * FROM dbo.reconloads 
GO
